    • deregisterConnection

      public void deregisterConnection(SocketClientConnection c)
      This method handles the connection differently if we are in game or waiting in lobby
      Parameters:
      c - the connection that has to be shutdown

    • lobby

      public void lobby(SocketClientConnection c, String name) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException, InterruptedException
      The connection try to create a game, if we have the number of connection equal to the number of player we create a game
      Parameters:
      c - The socketConnection which is currently running
      name - The name of the player
      Throws:
      IOException
      ClassNotFoundException
      InterruptedException - Thrown when the modifyGame doesn't end

    • run

      public void run()
      Accept the connection and create a SocketClientConnection for each socket

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the name is not already chosen, false instead

    • loadGame

      public Thread loadGame(String choice)
      Load the game saved
      Parameters:
      choice - is 1 if the game saved has to be loaded, 0 if a new game has to be created
      Returns:
      the thread used
